name: FocusEvent.FocusEvent
description: The FocusEvent() constructor returns a newly created FocusEvent object with an optional EventTarget. When the event has both a source and a destination, the relatedTarget value must be set to the other target.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
